capability.name: Direct Debit Mandate
capability.definition: This service domains manages the customer mandates associated with direct debit processing for a corporate client
capability.role: Customer mandates are administered/managed that are associated with a direct debit processing facility provided for a corporate client. The individual customer mandates are registered and may be updated/amended. The mandates are referenced to confirm coverage when direct debit processing is undertaken periodically
capability.example: A customer completes a direct debit mandate for a corporate client that is registered

key_features.name: Register customer direct debit mandates
key_features.description: Enables register customer direct debit mandates to support this service domains manages the customer mandates associated with direct debit processing for a corporate client

key_features.name: Update customer mandates
key_features.description: Enables update customer mandates to support this service domains manages the customer mandates associated with direct debit processing for a corporate client

key_features.name: Provide mandate details/confirm coverage
key_features.description: Enables provide mandate details/confirm coverage to support this service domains manages the customer mandates associated with direct debit processing for a corporate client
